mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM danggeun WHERE true

SELECT id, title, name, type_id, type_name, price, content, writer_email, writer_name, view_cnt, zzim_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM danggeun WHERE true
ORDER BY reg_date desc, id desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

choose.otherwise: AND (title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO danggeun (title, name, type_id, type_name, price, content, writer_email, writer_name) VALUES(#{title}, #{name}, #{type_id}, #{type_name}, #{price}, #{content}, #{writer_email}, #{writer_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM danggeun WHERE id = #{id} AND writer_email = #{writer_email}
